typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	LoadDate as timestamp (currentUTC("Berlin"))
}
source(output(
		Order_SID as integer,
		Order_ID as integer,
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DVHubOrders
source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Quantity as integer,
		Discount as float
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> NortwindOrderDetails
source(output(
		Product_SID as integer,
		Product_ID as integer,
		Product_Name as string,
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StarDimProducts
source(output(
		Link_Order_Details_SID as integer,
		Product_SID as integer,
		Order_SID as integer,
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DVLinkOrderDetails
DVHubOrders, NortwindOrderDetails join(Order_ID == OrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Verbinden1
Select2 derive(LoadDate = $LoadDate,
		RecordSource = 'NorthwindDV') ~> AbgeleiteteSpalte1
Verbinden3, StarDimProducts join(DVLinkOrderDetails@Product_SID == StarDimProducts@Product_SID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Verbinden2
Verbinden1, DVLinkOrderDetails join(DVHubOrders@Order_SID == DVLinkOrderDetails@Order_SID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Verbinden3
Verbinden2 select(mapColumn(
		Order_ID,
		UnitPrice,
		Quantity,
		Product_SID = StarDimProducts@Product_SID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
AbgeleiteteSpalte1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Order_ID as integer,
		Product_SID as integer,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> StarFactOrders
